channel.title: London Tech Events by Chuffed Coaching
channel.description: A curated list of interesting tech events in London for developers and entrepreneurs.

item.title: Vibe Coding Meetup
item.description: This meetup is a social coding jam where we use AI to quickly turn fun ideas into functional prototypes.
item.location: The Chapel Market Tavern 58 Penton St, London N1 9PZ, United Kingdom ¬∑ London

item.title: MCP Server Builder Series - London
item.description: Join fellow developers and creators for an interactive event dedicated to Model Context Protocol (MCP) server development.

item.title: JavaScript London in Collaboration with Newday
item.description: We have some fantastic tech talks lined up, there will be plenty of pizzas üçï, and of course drinks üçª, plus plenty of networking with fellow tech enthusiasts.

item.title: Product Pints: September Drinks üçª
item.description: An informal gathering for startup founders to practice their pitch, get feedback, and connect over a drink.
item.location: Serata Hall, 207 Old St, London EC1V 9NR, London EC1V 9NR
